attributes.action: recognise care workers for their skills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
recognise home care workers as skilled work force within this country. the vast majority are working for private domicilary homecare agencies, have nvq's, fully trained and do a very thankless job. where if they did not, then a vast majority of vulnerable and elderly would no longer be able to stay in their own homes. home care workers are very undervalued and very low paid. pay is usually £5.53 per hour or £3.50 per half hour, they only get paid for the exact hours they do, with no allowances. to get a decent wage, many have to work 50 plus hours per week.
we need these very caring, dedicated individuals to be nationally recognised and paid a decent wage.
